headline: BD Launches New Cell Analyzer Configurations to Bring Cutting-Edge Capabilities to Labs of All Sizes
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced the global commercial release of new configurations of cell analyzers featuring breakthrough spectral and real-time cell imaging technologies, enabling more labs in academia, pharma and biotech – across scales, needs and budgets – to advance discoveries in immunology, cancer immunotherapy and cell biology.
